nodes.title: Just found a shrimp tail in my growth stocks
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

nodes.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
nodes.title: Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies

nodes.excerpt: Beatflyer is the most powerful social media posts creator with a wide-range of effects which can also sync to the music. Import your designs, design from scratch, or start from one of the crafted templates.
nodes.title: Beatflyer 2.0 - Social media posts on steroids
nodes.author: Christian Giordano

nodes.excerpt: Campah is the easiest way to tie all your content together. Simply claim a URL, set up your link cards, and share your link! You'll have a live page in a minute.
nodes.title: Campah - A space for everything you create
nodes.author: Shah Galeeb Ahmed

nodes.excerpt: The Self Stack is everything you need to build a transparent, user obsessed digital studio. No Google. No Facebook. No trust violations. This is agency creativity without sacrificing your soul.
nodes.title: Self Stack - A curated directory of privacy first agency tools
nodes.author: Joan Westenberg

nodes.excerpt: Slack Connect allows you to send direct messages to people outside your company, simplifying the way you work with partners. Use this feature to seamlessly schedule meetings, sign documents and quickly collaborate on important tasks without ever leaving Slack.
nodes.title: Slack Connect Direct Messages - DM anyone outside your company from Slack
nodes.author: Sam Evans

nodes.excerpt: Focus on one important task today. You decide what to focus on. After you set today's task you can't change or delete it. Keep a streak of days you finished your daily task.
nodes.title: TinyDo - One task today
nodes.author: Igor Dyachuk

nodes.excerpt: How would you like to solve all the mysteries of your data in just seconds? Simply pick an AI-based Template and voila -- instant discoveries in front of you. Combine different Templates to look at your data from unlimited angles!
nodes.title: Stormly 2.0 - Turn your data into insights with a single click ğŸ¤¯

nodes.excerpt: The UI Coach anonymous feedback platform allows UI/UX designers to post their work and receive feedback and critiques from other designers from all around the world. UI Coach helps you create better designs and grow your skills by allowing you to get the feedback you need when you need it most.
nodes.title: UI Feedback - Free anonymous feedback  for UI/UX designers
nodes.author: Jim Raptis

nodes.excerpt: With Palette you can add colors to your palette and click to copy the HEX when you need a color.
nodes.title: Palette - Store and share colors between apps
nodes.author: Dave

nodes.excerpt: Invest in Alternative assets like crypto, collectibles, real estate, and more? No more silly spreadsheets to track your Alt investments. Connect your Alt accounts to track your portfolio's performance. Also, discover over 150 new investments on MoneyMade!
nodes.title: MoneyMade - Track all of your alternative investments from one place
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Compose private notes, optionally share them with others and still stay in control of who can access your data. All while having an excellent offline-first experience on all platforms.
nodes.title: Serenity Notes - End-to-end encrypted collaborative notes app

nodes.excerpt: WeLoveNoCode tutorials is a free database of NoCode lessons for such tools as Bubble, Webflow, Zapier and hundreds more! Add your own tutorial and get a $300 promo code for Adalo - the most popular NoCode tools for building mobile apps
nodes.title: NoCode Tutorials - Free database of NoCode tutorials

nodes.excerpt: Discover the power of Walling and kickstart your next project with the new Walling templates. No complex workflows. No wasted hours setting up random templates that don't work. With Walling, it is simple, just put it on a wall! Start a new wall: https://wall.new
nodes.title: Walling Templates - Plan and organize everything, with zero friction

nodes.excerpt: The data management App that gives users ownership and control of their data - Collect your data from multiple platforms - View your data in an intuitive dashboard - Choose who can access your data and who can't
nodes.title: Rita Personal Data - Collect, view and control your data
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
nodes.title: Porter - Heroku that runs in your own cloud
nodes.author: Michael Seibel
